article.title: Notes on Belarusan
article.para: Belarusan uses an apostrophe to write the absence of palatalisation. The EKI letter database suggests to use U+02BC ʼ MODIFIER LETTER APOSTROPHE while the Wikipedia suggests to use U+2019 ’ RIGHT SINGLE QUOTATION MARK. Here, we used U+02BC.
Of course, the ambiguous U+0027 ' APOSTROPHE is often found in actual documents.
